[Ohio Senate 2024 | Columbus Metro (Franklin County - Upper Arlington/Dublin) | P2: M, 38, Tech worker (Amazon), Dublin, Biden 2020, economic progressive]
Q: What about Jim Stanton?
"No serious tech policy. Just slogans about bringing manufacturing back."

content_original: No serious tech policy. Just slogans about bringing manufacturing back.
